name: slotassets
description: A simulated browser-based slot machine game demonstrating the AWS SDK for JavaScript V3.

scripts.build:frontend: webpack MyLambdaApp/index.js --mode development --target web --devtool false -o MyLambdaApp/main.js
scripts.build:backend: webpack slotpull.js --mode development --target node --devtool false --output-library-target umd -o index.js

author: Doug-AWS, AllanFly120
